"""Test Gaussian process predictions with the quadratic kernel."""
train_features, train_targets, test_features, test_targets = get_data()
kdict = [{'type': 'quadratic', 'slope': 1.0, 'degree': 1.0, 'scaling': 1.0,
    'bounds': ((1e-05, None),) * (np.shape(train_features)[1] + 1),
    'scaling_bounds': ((0.0, None),)}]
gp = GaussianProcess(train_fp=train_features, train_target=train_targets,
    kernel_list=kdict, regularization=np.sqrt(0.001),
    optimize_hyperparameters=True, scale_data=True)
pred = gp.predict(test_fp=test_features, test_target=test_targets,
    get_validation_error=True, get_training_error=True)
self.assertEqual(len(pred['prediction']), len(test_features))
print('quadratic prediction:', pred['validation_error']['rmse_average'])
